name: Snake Remix
description:
A different kind of snake game!
Explore 6 different worlds, each time the snake eats it will grow a segment longer..
Just swipe in the direction you want the snake to move.
Tap to jump, some food is of the ground so you need to jump to get at it.
You can also jump across gap along your path.
Watch out for dangers, don't fall into water or lava...

You can change direction the snake while in mid air!
